T02bsu024_u:575: asti bhagini paryāyo yena mātṛgrāmo mātṛgrāmabhāvaṃ laghveva parivartayati pūrvākṣiptamātṛgrāmabhāvo laghvaśeṣaṃ kṣīyate na ca bhūyo mātṛgrāmeṣu upapattiṃ pratigṛṇhāti yāvadanuttaraparinirvāṇe hānyā [hyanatra sva]praṇidhānāt /

T02bsu024_u:779: syāt khalu punarbhadramukhā yuṣmākaṃ kāṃkṣā vā vimatirvānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenāsīdutpalavaktro nāma yena tasya jyotisomyagandhāvabhāsaśriyastathāgatasya saparivārasyānekavidhaṃ pūjopasthānaṃ kṛtamanekaiśca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ apramāṇāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśasahasrāṇi (Dutt 49)
